Title: Relates photo speed violation monitoring systems in a highway construction or maintenance work area; makes permanent
Summary: Increases the number of photo speed violation monitoring systems in a highway construction or maintenance work area; makes such provisions permanent.
LawCode: Amd ยง1180-e, V & T L; amd ยง16, Chap 421 of 2021
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to increasing the number of photo speed violation monitoring systems in a highway construction or maintenance work area; and to amend chapter 421 of the laws of 2021 amending the vehicle and traffic law and the general municipal law relating to certain notices of liability, in relation to making such provisions permanent
